modName: J'arziin Your Typical Skyrim Khajiit Follower
summary: Do you ever get bored of the base game followers? Well this wont really help you because J'arziin is very close to being  them!
descriptionHtml:
J'arziin will be located in the Four Shields Inn in the town of Dragon Bridge. He wears Deadric armor and has a Blades Sword. Ask him to follow you and its done.

Morrowind Original:Â http://www.nexusmods.com/morrowind/mods/43445/?
author: JustADovah
